analyzed: sabba usadha dharaṇidhare neka puppha mālya vitate gajaga vaja mahi saru ru camara pasada khagga gokaṇṇa sīha byaggha dīpi accha kokatara chauddāraka dali miga biḷārasa sa kaṇṇikā anucarite
ākiṇṇa nela maṇḍala mahāvarāha nāga kula kareṇu saṅgha adhivuṭṭhe issa miga sākha miga sarabha miga eṇī miga vāta miga pasada miga purisa alu kimpurisa yakkha rakkha sani sevite
amajjava mañjarīdhara pahaṭṭha puppha phusita gga aneka pādapa gaṇa vitate kurara cakora vāraṇa mayūra parabhata jīvañjīvaka celāvaka abhiṅkāra karavīka matta vihaṅga gaṇa satata sampaghuṭṭhe
añjana manosilā haritāla hiṅgulaka hema rajata kanaka aneka dhātu sata vinaddha paṭimaṇḍita ppadese

original: evarūpe khalu, bho, ramme vanasaṇḍe kuṇālo nāma sakuṇo paṭivasati ativiya citto ativiya cittapattacchadano.
analyzed: evarūpe khalu bho ramme vana saṇḍe kuṇālaḥ nāma sakuṇaḥ paṭivasati ativiya cittaḥ ativiya citta patta chadanaḥ

original: Tasseva khalu, bho, kuṇālassa sakuṇassa aḍḍhuḍḍhāni itthisahassāni paricārikā dijakaññāyo,
analyzed: tassa iva khalu bho kuṇālassa sakuṇassa aḍḍhuḍḍhāni itthi sahassāni paricārikāḥ dija kaññāyo

original: atha khalu, bho, dve dijakaññāyo kaṭṭhaṁ mukhena ḍaṁsitvā taṁ kuṇālaṁ sakuṇaṁ majjhe
analyzed: atha khalu bho dve dija kaññāyo kaṭṭham mukhena ḍasitvā tam kuṇālam sakuṇam majjhe

original: “mā naṁ kuṇālaṁ sakuṇaṁ addhānapariyāyapathe kilamatho ubbāhetthā”ti.
analyzed: mā nam kuṇālam sakuṇam addhāna pariyāya pathe kilamathaḥ ubbāhettha ati
pañca satāḥ dija kaññāyaḥ heṭṭhatas heṭṭhatas uḍḍenti

original: “sacāyaṁ kuṇālo sakuṇo āsanā paripatissati, mayaṁ taṁ pakkhehi paṭiggahessāmā”ti.
analyzed: sacā ayam kuṇālaḥ sakuṇaḥ āsanā paripatissati mayam tam pakkhehi paṭiggahessāma ati
mā nam kuṇālam sakuṇam paritāpesi iti
pañcasatā pañcasatā dija kaññāyaḥ ubhatopassena uḍḍenti

original: “mā naṁ kuṇālaṁ sakuṇaṁ sītaṁ vā uṇhaṁ vā tiṇaṁ vā rajo vā vāto vā ussāvo vā upapphusī”ti.
analyzed: mā nam kuṇālam sakuṇam sītam vā uṇham vā tiṇam vā rajaḥ vā vātaḥ vā ussāvaḥ vā upapphusīti
pañca satā dija kaññāyo puratas puratas uḍḍenti

original: “mā naṁ kuṇālaṁ sakuṇaṁ gopālakā vā pasupālakā vā tiṇahārakā vā kaṭṭhahārakā vā vanakammikā
analyzed: mā nam kuṇālam sakuṇam gopālakāḥ vā pasu pālakāḥ vā tiṇa hārakāḥ vā kaṭṭha hārakāḥ vā vana kammikā

original: vā kaṭṭhena vā kaṭhalena vā pāṇinā vā (…) leḍḍunā vā daṇḍena vā satthena vā sakkharāhi vā pahāraṁ adaṁsu.
analyzed: vā kaṭṭhena vā kaṭhalena vā pāṇinā vā leḍḍunā vā daṇḍena vā satthena vā sakkharāhi vā pahāram

original: Māyaṁ kuṇālo sakuṇo gacchehi vā latāhi vā rukkhehi vā sākhāhi vā thambhehi vā pāsāṇehi vā balavantehi vā pakkhīhi saṅgamesī”ti.
analyzed: mā ayam kuṇālaḥ sakuṇaḥ gacchehi vā latāhi vā rukkhehi vā sākhāhi vā thambhehi vā pāsāṇehi vā balavantehi vā pakkhīhi saṅgamesi iti

original: Pañcasatā dijakaññāyo pacchato pacchato uḍḍenti saṇhāhi sakhilāhi mañjūhi madhurāhi vācāhi samudācarantiyo—
analyzed: pañca satā dija kaññāyo pacchatas pacchatas uḍḍenti saṇhāhi sakhilāhi mañjūhi madhurāhi vācāhi samudācarantiyo
mā ayam kuṇālaḥ sakuṇaḥ āsane pariyukkaṇṭhi iti
pañca satāḥ dija kaññāyaḥ disodisam uḍḍenti aneka rukkha vividha vikati phalam āharantiyaḥ
mā ayam kuṇālaḥ sakuṇaḥ khudāya parikilamittha ati

original: Atha khalu, bho, tā dijakaññāyo taṁ kuṇālaṁ sakuṇaṁ ārāmeneva ārāmaṁ uyyāneneva uyyānaṁ
analyzed: atha khalu bho tāḥ dija kaññāyo tam kuṇālam sakuṇam ārāmena iva ārāmam uyyānena iva uyyāna

original: nadītittheneva nadītitthaṁ pabbatasikhareneva pabbatasikharaṁ ambavaneneva ambavanaṁ
analyzed: nadī titthena iva nadī tittham pabbata sikharena iva pabbata sikharam ambavanena iva ambavana

original: jambuvaneneva jambuvanaṁ labujavaneneva labujavanaṁ nāḷikerasañcāriyeneva nāḷikerasañcāriyaṁ
analyzed: jambu vanena iva jambu vanam labuja vanena iva labuja vanam nāḷikerasañcāriyena iva nāḷikerasañcāriya

original: Atha khalu, bho, kuṇālo sakuṇo tāhi dijakaññāhi divasaṁ paribyūḷho evaṁ apasādeti—
analyzed: atha khalu bho kuṇālaḥ sakuṇaḥ tāhi dija kaññāhi divasam paribyūḍhaḥ evam

original: “nassatha tumhe vasaliyo, vinassatha tumhe vasaliyo, coriyo dhuttiyo asatiyo lahucittāyo katassa appaṭikārikāyo anilo viya yenakāmaṅgamāyo”ti.
analyzed: nassatha tumhe vasaliyaḥ vinassatha tumhe vasaliyaḥ coriyaḥ dhuttiyaḥ asatiyaḥ lahu cittāyaḥ katassa appaṭikārikāyaḥ anilaḥ viya yena kāma aṅgamāyaḥ ti

original: Tasseva khalu, bho, himavato pabbatarājassa puratthimadisābhāge susukhumasunipuṇagirippabhava—
analyzed: tassa iva khalu bho himavataḥ pabbatarājassa puratthima disā bhāge su sukhuma su nipuṇa giri ppabhava

original: Uppala paduma kumuda nalina satapatta sogandhika mandālaka sampativirūḷhasucigandhamanuññamāvakappadese.
analyzed: uppala paduma kumuda nalina satapatta sogandhika mandālaka sampati virūḍha sucigandha manuññamāvaka ppadese
kuravaka mucalinda ketaka vedisa vañjula punnāga bakula tilaka piyaka hasana sāla saḷala campaka asoka nāga rukkha tirīṭi bhuja pattala udda candana ogha vane

kāḷa agaru padma kapiyaṅgu devadāruka coca gahane kakudha kuṭaja aṅkola kaccikāra kaṇikāra kaṇṇikāra kanavera koraṇḍaka koviḷāra kisuka yodhika vanamallika manaṅgaṇa manavajja bhaṇḍi surucira bhagini mālā malya dhare
jāti sumana madhugandhika dhanu takkāri tālīsa tagara musīra koṭṭhaka cha vitate atimuttaka saṅkusumita latā vitata paṭimaṇḍita ppadese
hasa pilava kādamba kāraṇḍava abhinadite vijjādhara siddha samaṇa tāpasa gaṇa adhivuṭṭhe vara deva yakkha rakkhasa dānava gandhabba kinnara mahoraga anuciṇṇa ppadese

original: evarūpe khalu, bho, ramme vanasaṇḍe puṇṇamukho nāma phussakokilo paṭivasati ativiya
analyzed: evarūpe khalu bho ramme vana saṇḍe puṇṇamukhaḥ nāma phussa kokilo paṭivasati

original: Tasseva khalu, bho, puṇṇamukhassa phussakokilassa aḍḍhuḍḍhāni itthisatāni paricārikā dijakaññāyo.
analyzed: tassa iva khalu bho puṇṇamukhassa phussa kokilassa aḍḍhuḍḍhāni itthi satāni paricārikāḥ dija kaññāyo

original: Atha khalu, bho, dve dijakaññāyo kaṭṭhaṁ mukhena ḍaṁsitvā taṁ puṇṇamukhaṁ phussakokilaṁ majjhe nisīdāpetvā uḍḍenti—
analyzed: atha khalu bho dve dija kaññāyo kaṭṭham mukhena ḍasitvā tam puṇṇamukham phussa kokilam majjhe nisīdāpetvā uḍḍenti

original: “mā naṁ puṇṇamukhaṁ phussakokilaṁ addhānapariyāyapathe kilamatho ubbāhetthā”ti.
analyzed: mā nam puṇṇamukham phussa kokilam addhāna pariyāya pathe kilamatho ubbāhettha ati

original: “sacāyaṁ puṇṇamukho phussakokilo āsanā paripatissati, mayaṁ taṁ pakkhehi paṭiggahessāmā”ti.
analyzed: sacā ayam puṇṇamukhaḥ phussa kokilaḥ āsanā paripatissati mayam tam pakkhehi paṭiggahessāma ati
mā nam puṇṇamukham phussa kokilam ātapo paritāpesi iti

original: “mā naṁ puṇṇamukhaṁ phussakokilaṁ sītaṁ vā uṇhaṁ vā tiṇaṁ vā rajo vā vāto vā ussāvo vā upapphusī”ti.
analyzed: mā nam puṇṇamukham phussa kokilam sītam vā uṇham vā tiṇam vā rajaḥ vā vātaḥ vā ussāvaḥ vā upapphusīti

original: “mā naṁ puṇṇamukhaṁ phussakokilaṁ gopālakā vā pasupālakā vā tiṇahārakā vā kaṭṭhahārakā
analyzed: mā nam puṇṇamukham phussa kokilam gopālakāḥ vā pasu pālakāḥ vā tiṇa hārakāḥ vā kaṭṭha hārakā

original: vā vanakammikā vā kaṭṭhena vā kaṭhalena vā pāṇinā vā leḍḍunā vā daṇḍena vā satthena
analyzed: vā vanakammikā vā kaṭṭhena vā kaṭhalena vā pāṇinā vā leḍḍunā vā daṇḍena vā satthena

original: Māyaṁ puṇṇamukho phussakokilo gacchehi vā latāhi vā rukkhehi vā sākhāhi vā thambhehi vā pāsāṇehi vā balavantehi vā pakkhīhi saṅgamesī”ti.
analyzed: mā ayam puṇṇamukhaḥ phussa kokilaḥ gacchehi vā latāhi vā rukkhehi vā sākhāhi vā thambhehi vā pāsāṇehi vā balavantehi vā pakkhīhi saṅgamesi iti

original: Paññāsa dijakaññāyo pacchato pacchato uḍḍenti saṇhāhi sakhilāhi mañjūhi madhurāhi vācāhi samudācarantiyo—
analyzed: paññāsa dijakaññāyo pacchatas pacchatas uḍḍenti saṇhāhi sakhilāhi mañjūhi madhurāhi vācāhi samudācarantiyaḥ
mā ayam puṇṇamukhaḥ phussa kokilaḥ āsane pariyukkaṇṭhi iti
paññāsa dija kaññāyaḥ disodisam uḍḍenti aneka rukkha vividha vikati phalam āharantiyaḥ
mā ayam puṇṇamukhaḥ phussa kokilaḥ khudāya parikilamittha ati

original: Atha khalu, bho, tā dijakaññāyo taṁ puṇṇamukhaṁ phussakokilaṁ ārāmeneva ārāmaṁ uyyāneneva
analyzed: atha khalu bho tāḥ dija kaññāyo tam puṇṇamukham phussa kokilam ārāmena iva ārāmam uyyānena iva

original: uyyānaṁ nadītittheneva nadītitthaṁ pabbatasikhareneva pabbatasikharaṁ ambavaneneva
analyzed: uyyānam nadī titthena iva nadī tittham pabbata sikharena iva pabbata sikharam ambavanena iva

original: ambavanaṁ jambuvaneneva jambuvanaṁ labujavaneneva labujavanaṁ nāḷikerasañcāriyeneva
analyzed: amba vanam jambu vanena iva jambu vanam labuja vanena iva labuja vanam nāḷikera sañcāriyena iva
nāḷikera sañcāriyam khippam eva abhisambhonti ratitthāya

original: Atha khalu, bho, puṇṇamukho phussakokilo tāhi dijakaññāhi divasaṁ paribyūḷho evaṁ pasaṁsati—
analyzed: atha khalu bho puṇṇamukhaḥ phussa kokilaḥ tāhi dija kaññāhi divasam paribyūḷhaḥ evam pasasati

original: “sādhu sādhu, bhaginiyo, etaṁ kho, bhaginiyo, tumhākaṁ patirūpaṁ kuladhītānaṁ, yaṁ tumhe bhattāraṁ paricareyyāthā”ti.
analyzed: sādhu sādhu bhaginiyo etam kho bhaginiyo tumhākam pati rūpam yam tumhe bhattāram paricareyyātha ati

original: Atha khalu, bho, puṇṇamukho phussakokilo yena kuṇālo sakuṇo tenupasaṅkami.
analyzed: atha khalu bho puṇṇamukhaḥ phussa kokilaḥ yena kuṇālaḥ sakuṇaḥ tena upasaṅkami

original: Addasaṁsu kho kuṇālassa sakuṇassa paricārikā dijakaññāyo taṁ puṇṇamukhaṁ phussakokilaṁ dūratova āgacchantaṁ;
analyzed: addasasu kho kuṇālassa sakuṇassa paricārikāḥ dija kaññāyo tam puṇṇamukham phussa kokilam dūratas vā āgacchanta

original: disvāna yena puṇṇamukho phussakokilo tenupasaṅkamiṁsu; upasaṅkamitvā taṁ puṇṇamukhaṁ phussakokilaṁ etadavocuṁ—
analyzed: disvāna yena puṇṇamukhaḥ phussa kokilo tena upasaṅkamisu upasaṅkamitvā tam puṇṇamukham phussa kokilam etat avocu

original: “ayaṁ, samma puṇṇamukha, kuṇālo sakuṇo ativiya pharuso ativiya pharusavāco, appevanāma tavampi āgamma piyavācaṁ labheyyāmā”ti.
analyzed: aya samma puṇṇamukha kuṇālo sakuṇaḥ ativiya pharusaḥ ativiya pharusa vācaḥ āgamma piya vācam labheyyāma ati

original: “Appevanāma, bhaginiyo”ti vatvā yena kuṇālo sakuṇo tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā kuṇālena sakuṇena saddhiṁ paṭisammoditvā ekamantaṁ nisīdi.
analyzed: appeva nāma bhaginiyā iti vatvā yena kuṇālaḥ sakuṇaḥ tena upasaṅkami upasaṅkamitvā kuṇālena sakuṇena saddhim paṭisammoditvā ekamantam nisīdi

original: Ekamantaṁ nisinno kho puṇṇamukho phussakokilo taṁ kuṇālaṁ sakuṇaṁ etadavoca—
analyzed: ekamantam nisinnaḥ kho puṇṇamukhaḥ phussa kokilaḥ tam kuṇālam sakuṇam etat avoca

original: “kissa tvaṁ, samma kuṇāla, itthīnaṁ sujātānaṁ kuladhītānaṁ sammāpaṭipannānaṁ micchāpaṭipannosi?
analyzed: kissa tva samma kuṇālaḥ itthīnam su jātānam kula dhītānam sammā paṭipannānam micchā paṭipannaḥ asi

original: Amanāpabhāṇīnampi kira, samma kuṇāla, itthīnaṁ manāpabhāṇinā bhavitabbaṁ, kimaṅga pana manāpabhāṇīnan”ti.
analyzed: a manāpa bhāṇīnam pi kira samma kuṇāla itthīnam manāpa bhāṇinā kim aṅga pana manāpa bhāṇīnam ti

original: Evaṁ vutte, kuṇālo sakuṇo taṁ puṇṇamukhaṁ phussakokilaṁ evaṁ apasādesi—
analyzed: evam vutte kuṇālaḥ sakuṇaḥ tam puṇṇamukham phussa kokilam evam apasādesi

original: “nassa tvaṁ, samma jamma vasala, vinassa tvaṁ, samma jamma vasala, ko nu tayā viyatto jāyājinenā”ti.
analyzed: nassa tva samma jamma vasala vinassa tva samma jamma vasala kaḥ nu tayā viyattaḥ jāyā ajinena ati

original: Evaṁ apasādito ca pana puṇṇamukho phussakokilo tatoyeva paṭinivatti.
analyzed: evam apasāditaḥ ca pana puṇṇamukhaḥ phussa kokilo tatoyeva paṭinivatti

original: Atha khalu, bho, puṇṇamukhassa phussakokilassa aparena samayena nacirasseva kharo ābādho uppajji lohitapakkhandikā bāḷhā vedanā vattanti māraṇantikā.
analyzed: atha khalu bho puṇṇamukhassa phussa kokilassa aparena samayena nacirassa iva kharaḥ ābādhaḥ uppajji lohita pakkhandikāḥ bāḷhāḥ vedanāḥ vattanti māraṇantikā

original: Atha khalu, bho, puṇṇamukhassa phussakokilassa paricārikānaṁ dijakaññānaṁ etadahosi—
analyzed: atha khalu bho puṇṇamukhassa phussa kokilassa paricārikānam dija kaññānam etat ahosi

original: “ābādhiko kho ayaṁ puṇṇamukho phussakokilo, appevanāma imamhā ābādhā vuṭṭhaheyyā”ti ekaṁ adutiyaṁ ohāya yena kuṇālo sakuṇo tenupasaṅkamiṁsu.
analyzed: ābādhikaḥ kho ayam puṇṇamukhaḥ phussakokilaḥ appeva nāma imamhā ābādhā vuṭṭhaheyya ati ekam adutiyam ohāya yena kuṇālaḥ sakuṇo tena upasaṅkamisu

original: Addasā kho kuṇālo sakuṇo tā dijakaññāyo dūratova āgacchantiyo, disvāna tā dijakaññāyo etadavoca—
analyzed: addasā kho kuṇālaḥ sakuṇaḥ tāḥ dija kaññāyaḥ dūratas vas āgacchantiyaḥ disvāna tāḥ dija kaññāyaḥ etat avoca
kaham pana tumham vasaliyaḥ bhattā ati

original: “Ābādhiko kho, samma kuṇāla, puṇṇamukho phussakokilo appevanāma tamhā ābādhā vuṭṭhaheyyā”ti.
analyzed: ābādhiko kho samma kuṇāla puṇṇamukho phussakokilo tamhā ābādhā vuṭṭhaheyya ati

original: Evaṁ vutte, kuṇālo sakuṇo tā dijakaññāyo evaṁ apasādesi—
analyzed: evam vutte kuṇālaḥ sakuṇaḥ tāḥ dija kaññāyaḥ evam apasādesi

original: “nassatha tumhe vasaliyo, vinassatha tumhe vasaliyo, coriyo dhuttiyo asatiyo lahucittāyo katassa appaṭikārikāyo anilo viya yenakāmaṅgamāyo”ti;
analyzed: nassatha tumhe vasaliyaḥ vinassatha tumhe vasaliyaḥ coriyaḥ dhuttiyaḥ asatiyaḥ lahu cittāyaḥ katassa appaṭikārikāyaḥ anilaḥ viya yena kāma aṅgamāyaḥ ti

original: vatvā yena puṇṇamukho phussakokilo tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā taṁ puṇṇamukhaṁ phussakokilaṁ etadavoca—
analyzed: vatvā yena puṇṇamukhaḥ phussa kokilo tena upasaṅkami upasaṅkamitvā tam puṇṇamukham phussa kokilam etat avoca

original: Atha khalu, bho kuṇālo sakuṇo taṁ puṇṇamukhaṁ phussakokilaṁ pakkhehi ca mukhatuṇḍakena ca pariggahetvā vuṭṭhāpetvā nānābhesajjāni pāyāpesi.
analyzed: atha khalu bho kuṇālaḥ sakuṇaḥ tam puṇṇamukham phussa kokilam pakkhehi ca mukha tuṇḍakena ca pariggahetvā vuṭṭhāpetvā nānā bhesajjāni pāyāpesi

original: Atha khalu, bho, puṇṇamukhassa phussakokilassa so ābādho paṭippassambhīti.
analyzed: atha khalu bho puṇṇamukhassa phussa kokilassa saḥ ābādhaḥ paṭippassambhi iti

original: Atha khalu, bho, kuṇālo sakuṇo taṁ puṇṇamukhaṁ phussakokilaṁ gilānavuṭṭhitaṁ aciravuṭṭhitaṁ gelaññā etadavoca—
analyzed: atha khalu bho kuṇālaḥ sakuṇaḥ tam puṇṇamukham phussa kokilam gilāna vuṭṭhitam acira vuṭṭhitam gelaññā etat avoca

original: “Diṭṭhā mayā, samma puṇṇamukha, kaṇhā dvepitikā pañcapatikāya chaṭṭhe purise cittaṁ paṭibandhantiyā, yadidaṁ kabandhe pīṭhasappimhī”ti.
analyzed: diṭṭhā mayā samma puṇṇamukha kaṇhā dvepitikā pañca patikāya chaṭṭhe purise cittam paṭibandhantiyā yat idam kabandhe pīṭha sappimhi iti

original: Diṭṭhā mayā, samma puṇṇamukha, saccatapāpī nāma samaṇī susānamajjhe vasantī catutthabhattaṁ pariṇāmayamānā surādhuttakena pāpamakāsi.
analyzed: diṭṭhā mayā samma puṇṇamukha saccatapāpī nāma samaṇī susāna majjhe vasantī catutthabhattam pariṇāmayamānā surā dhuttakena pāpam akāsi

original: Diṭṭhā mayā, samma puṇṇamukha, kākavatī nāma devī samuddamajjhe vasantī bhariyā venateyyassa naṭakuverena pāpamakāsi.
analyzed: diṭṭhā mayā samma puṇṇamukha kākavatī nāma devī samudda majjhe vasantī bhariyā venateyyassa naṭa kuverena pāpam akāsi

original: Diṭṭhā mayā, samma puṇṇamukha, kuruṅgadevī nāma lomasuddarī eḷikakumāraṁ kāmayamānā chaḷaṅgakumāradhanantevāsinā pāpamakāsi.
analyzed: diṭṭhā mayā samma puṇṇamukha kuruṅgadevī nāma lomasuddarī eḷika kumāram kāmayamānā chaḷaṅga kumāra dhana antevāsinā pāpam akāsi

original: Etā ca aññā ca akaṁsu pāpaṁ,
analyzed: etā ca aññā ca a kasu pāpa
tasmā aham itthīnam na vissase na pasase
sabba sahā a phandanā a kuppā

original: Na khalu, samma puṇṇamukha, vesiyo nāriyo gamaniyo, na hetā bandhakiyo nāma, vadhikāyo nāma etāyo, yadidaṁ vesiyo nāriyo gamaniyoti.
analyzed: na khalu samma puṇṇamukha vesiyaḥ nāriyaḥ gamaniyaḥ na hetā bandhakiyaḥ nāma vadhi kāyaḥ nāma yat idam vesiyaḥ nāriyaḥ gamaniyaḥ ti

original: Coro viya veṇikatā, madirāva diddhā vāṇijo viya vācāsanthutiyo, issasiṅghamiva viparivattāyo,
analyzed: coraḥ viya veṇika tā madirā ava diddhāḥ vāṇijaḥ viya vācā santhutiyaḥ issasiṅgham iva viparivattāyaḥ

original: uragāmiva dujivhāyo, sobbhamiva paṭicchannā, pātālamiva duppūrā rakkhasī viya duttosā,
analyzed: uragām iva sobbham iva paṭicchannā pātālam iva duppūrā rakkhasī viya duttosā

original: yamovekantahāriyo, sikhīriva sabbabhakkhā, nadīriva sabbavāhī, anilo viya yenakāmaṁcarā,
analyzed: sikhīḥ iva sabba bhakkhāḥ nadīḥ iva sabba vāhī anilaḥ viya yena kāma carā

original: neru viya avisesakarā, visarukkho viya niccaphalitāyoti.
Cattārimāni, samma puṇṇamukha, yāni vatthūni kicce jāte anatthacarāni bhavanti;
analyzed: cattāri imāni samma puṇṇamukha yāni vatthūni kicce jāte anattha carāni bhavanti

original: Cattāri etāni paṇḍito dhanāni gharā na vippavāsaye.
analyzed: cattāri etāni paṇḍitaḥ dhanāni na vippavāsaye

original: Cha imāni, samma puṇṇamukha, yāni vatthūni kicce jāte anatthacarāni bhavanti—
analyzed: cha imāni samma puṇṇamukha yāni vatthūni kicce jāte anattha carāni bhavanti
aguṇam dhanu ñāti kule ca bhariyā

original: Aṭṭhahi khalu, samma puṇṇamukha, ṭhānehi itthī sāmikaṁ avajānāti.
analyzed: aṭṭhahi khalu samma puṇṇamukha ṭhānehi itthī sāmikam avajānāti

original: Daliddatā, āturatā, jiṇṇatā, surāsoṇḍatā, muddhatā, pamattatā, sabbakiccesu anuvattanatā, sabbadhanaanuppadānena—
analyzed: dalidda tā ātura tā jiṇṇa tā surā soṇḍa tā muddha tā pamatta tā sabba kiccesu anuvattana tā sabba dhana anuppadānena

original: imehi khalu, samma puṇṇamukha, aṭṭhahi ṭhānehi itthī sāmikaṁ avajānāti.
analyzed: imehi khalu samma puṇṇamukha aṭṭhahi ṭhānehi itthī sāmikam avajānāti

original: Navahi khalu, samma puṇṇamukha, ṭhānehi itthī padosamāharati.
analyzed: navahi khalu samma puṇṇamukha ṭhānehi itthī padosam āharati

original: Ārāmagamanasīlā ca hoti, uyyānagamanasīlā ca hoti, nadītitthagamanasīlā ca hoti,
analyzed: ārāma gamana sīlā ca hoti uyyāna gamana sīlā ca hoti nadī tittha gamana sīlā ca hoti

original: ñātikulagamanasīlā ca hoti, parakulagamanasīlā ca hoti, ādāsadussamaṇḍanānuyogamanuyuttasīlā
analyzed: ñāti kula gamana sīlā ca hoti para kula gamana sīlā ca hoti ādāsa dussamaṇḍana anuyogam anuyutta sīlā

original: ca hoti, majjapāyinī ca hoti, nillokanasīlā ca hoti, sadvāraṭhāyinī ca hoti—
analyzed: ca hoti majja pāyinī ca hoti nillokana sīlā ca hoti sa dvāra ṭhāyinī ca hoti

original: imehi khalu, samma puṇṇamukha, navahi ṭhānehi itthī padosamāharatīti.
analyzed: imehi khalu samma puṇṇamukha navahi ṭhānehi itthī padosam āharati iti

original: Cattālīsāya khalu, samma puṇṇamukha, ṭhānehi itthī purisaṁ accācarati.
analyzed: cattālīsāya khalu samma puṇṇamukha ṭhānehi itthī purisam accācarati

original: Vijambhati, vinamati, vilasati, vilajjati, nakhena nakhaṁ ghaṭṭeti, pādena pādaṁ
analyzed: vijambhati vinamati vilasati vilajjati nakhena nakham ghaṭṭeti pādena pāda

original: akkamati, kaṭṭhena pathaviṁ vilikhati, dārakaṁ ullaṅghati ullaṅghāpeti, kīḷati kīḷāpeti,
analyzed: akkamati kaṭṭhena pathavim vilikhati dārakam ullaṅghati ullaṅghāpeti kīḷati kīḷāpeti

original: cumbati cumbāpeti, bhuñjati bhuñjāpeti, dadāti, yācati, katamanukaroti, uccaṁ bhāsati,
analyzed: cumbati bhuñjati bhuñjāpeti dadāti yācati katam anukaroti uccam bhāsati

original: nīcaṁ bhāsati, aviccaṁ bhāsati, viviccaṁ bhāsati, naccena gītena vāditena rodanena
analyzed: nīcam bhāsati aviccam bhāsati viviccam bhāsati naccena gītena vāditena rodanena

original: vilasitena vibhūsitena jagghati, pekkhati, kaṭiṁ cāleti, guyhabhaṇḍakaṁ sañcāleti,
analyzed: vilasitena vibhūsitena jagghati pekkhati kaṭim cāleti guyha bhaṇḍakam sañcāleti

original: ūruṁ vivarati, ūruṁ pidahati, thanaṁ dasseti, kacchaṁ dasseti, nābhiṁ dasseti, akkhiṁ
analyzed: ūrum vivarati ūrum pidahati thanam dasseti kaccham dasseti nābhim dasseti akkhi

original: nikhanati, bhamukaṁ ukkhipati, oṭṭhaṁ upalikhati, jivhaṁ nillāleti, dussaṁ muñcati,
analyzed: nikhanati bhamukam ukkhipati oṭṭham upalikhati jivham nillāleti dussam muñcati

original: dussaṁ paṭibandhati, sirasaṁ muñcati, sirasaṁ bandhati—
analyzed: dussam paṭibandhati sirasam muñcati sirasam bandhati

original: imehi khalu, samma puṇṇamukha, cattālīsāya ṭhānehi itthī purisaṁ accācarati.
analyzed: imehi khalu samma puṇṇamukha cattālīsāya ṭhānehi itthī purisam accācarati

original: Pañcavīsāya khalu, samma puṇṇamukha, ṭhānehi itthī paduṭṭhā veditabbā bhavati.
analyzed: pañcavīsāya khalu samma puṇṇamukha ṭhānehi itthī paduṭṭhā veditabbā bhavati

original: Sāmikassa pavāsaṁ vaṇṇeti, pavuṭṭhaṁ na sarati, āgataṁ nābhinandati, avaṇṇaṁ tassa
analyzed: sāmikassa pavāsam vaṇṇeti pavuṭṭham na sarati āgatam na abhinandati a vaṇṇam tassa

original: bhaṇati, vaṇṇaṁ tassa na bhaṇati, anatthaṁ tassa carati, atthaṁ tassa na carati,
analyzed: bhaṇati vaṇṇam tassa na bhaṇati anattham tassa carati attham tassa na carati

original: akiccaṁ tassa karoti, kiccaṁ tassa na karoti, paridahitvā sayati, parammukhī nipajjati,
analyzed: akiccam tassa karoti kiccam tassa na karoti paridahitvā sayati parammukhī nipajjati

original: parivattakajātā kho pana hoti kuṅkumiyajātā, dīghaṁ assasati, dukkhaṁ vedayati, uccārapassāvaṁ
analyzed: parivattaka jātā kho pana hoti kuṅkumiya jātā dīgham assasati dukkham vedayati uccāra passāva

original: abhiṇhaṁ gacchati, vilomamācarati, parapurisasaddaṁ sutvā kaṇṇasotaṁ vivaramodahati,
analyzed: abhiṇham gacchati vilomam ācarati para purisa saddam sutvā kaṇṇa sotam vivaram odahati

original: nihatabhogā kho pana hoti, paṭivissakehi santhavaṁ karoti, nikkhantapādā kho pana
analyzed: nihata bhogā kho pana hoti paṭivissakehi santhavam karoti nikkhanta pādā kho pana

original: hoti, visikhānucārinī aticārinī kho pana hoti, niccaṁ sāmike agāravā paduṭṭhamanasaṅkappā,
analyzed: hoti visikhā anucārinī aticārinī kho pana hoti niccam sāmike agāravā paduṭṭha mana saṅkappā

original: abhiṇhaṁ dvāre tiṭṭhati, kacchāni aṅgāni thanāni dasseti, disodisaṁ gantvā pekkhati—
analyzed: abhiṇham dvāre tiṭṭhati kacchāni aṅgāni thanāni dasseti disodisam gantvā pekkhati

original: imehi khalu, samma puṇṇamukha, pañcavīsāya ṭhānehi itthī paduṭṭhā veditabbā bhavati.
analyzed: imehi khalu samma puṇṇamukha pañcavīsāya ṭhānehi itthī paduṭṭhā veditabbā bhavati
attham ca hāpa iti a kicca kārinī

original: Sace labhetha khaṇaṁ vā raho vā,
analyzed: sace labhetha khaṇam vā rahaḥ vā
sabbattha na api iti karā api ce siyā
na vissase tittha samā hi nāriyā uti
kam vā api itthī na aticare
tam vā api sā na ajjhagā kāma kāminī

original: Na tā pajānanti kataṁ na kiccaṁ,
analyzed: na tā pajānanti katam na kit ca
silesu upamā sikhiḥ iva sabba bhakkhā

original: Na parassa bhariyā na dhanassa hetu,
analyzed: na parassa bhariyā na dhanassa hetu

original: Atha khalu, bho, ānando gijjharājā kuṇālassa sakuṇassa ādimajjhakathāpariyosānaṁ viditvā tāyaṁ velāyaṁ imā gāthāyo abhāsi—
analyzed: atha khalu bho ānandaḥ gijjha rājā kuṇālassa sakuṇassa ādi majjha kathā pariyosānam viditvā imāḥ gāthāyaḥ abhāsi
puṇṇam api ca imam pathavim dhanena
na vissase tittha samāḥ hi nāriyaḥ

original: Atha khalu, bho, nārado devabrāhmaṇo ānandassa gijjharājassa ādimajjhakathāpariyosānaṁ viditvā tāyaṁ velāyaṁ imā gāthāyo abhāsi—
analyzed: atha khalu bho nāradaḥ deva brāhmaṇaḥ ānandassa gijjha rājassa ādi majjha kathā pariyosānam viditvā imāḥ gāthāyaḥ abhāsi
sabba itthiyaḥ sikhiḥ iva sabba bhakkhā
sabba itthiyaḥ nadīḥ iva sabba vāhī

original: Atha khalu, bho, kuṇālo sakuṇo nāradassa devabrāhmaṇassa ādimajjhakathāpariyosānaṁ viditvā tāyaṁ velāyaṁ imā gāthāyo abhāsi—
analyzed: atha khalu bho kuṇālaḥ sakuṇaḥ nāradassa deva brāhmaṇassa ādi majjha kathā pariyosānam viditvā imāḥ gāthāyaḥ abhāsi
na atthi tāsam vinayaḥ na savaraḥ
yaḥ an ariya caritāni mā ācari
sa uṇṇa byamha nilayā ca accharā
